about_the_game:
Explore a world of adventure and puzzles in this game that pays tribute to the Game Boy era!

You are trapped in a mysterious place filled with secrets and challenges. Your mission is to use all your reasoning skills to discover the best strategy to collect keys, unlock doors, and reach the exit.

Each level brings new obstacles, requiring you to think creatively and quickly to overcome barriers and uncover hidden secrets.

Get ready for a nostalgic and challenging experience, where every move counts!

The path is full of dangers: holes, spikes, traps, destructive platforms, and much more!

Jumping on destructive platforms requires attention, as they disappear right after contact. Treacherous holes and hidden traps make every step a critical decision.

Strategically placed levers unlock new areas, adding an extra layer of strategy.

Every move counts, and precision in jumping is essential in Condemned: No Escape.

The combination of precise jumps and puzzle-solving makes each stage require not only agility but also careful analysis of the environment.

Mastering these mechanics offers a highly rewarding sense of achievement, especially as the secrets of the place are unveiled.

Every mistake can be costly, making precision one of the most important elements for success in your escape.
